name: The Trivia Arcade
overview: Try your luck at mastering trivia questions from five separate categories including: sports, music, TV, science and general. Race against the clock to choose your favorite trivia subject. Questions come onto the screen accompanied by a set of multiple choice answers, or you may opt to input your own response.And when you have become an expert in this challeng-ing game of trivia, Screenplay offers The Trivia Arcade Question Pack 2, which tests your skills on subjects ranging from history to comics.
